Terrain variation enhances spatial complexity and visual quality, while moderate sky openness maintains good spatial spaciousness. Biodiversity indicators are positive, promoting environmental health. Recommendations include conserving bottom-right scenic zones, leveraging bottom-left for sustainable development, and maintaining forest connectivity to enhance habitat resilience and landscape quality.</CONCLUSION>
